author: gstein
msg: svnmucc should accept -? like all our other commands.
* subversion/svnmucc/svnmucc.c:
(usage): no need to copy usage onto the stack. keep it as a normal
string constant. add -? into the list of options.
(main): no need to copy OPTIONS onto the stack; make it static.
add -?into the set of options and the big switch.

author: julien
msg: PIG-2702: Make Pig local mode (and tests) faster by working around the hard coded sleep(5000) in hadoop's JobControl

author: gstein
msg: Minor tweaks to the new replay APIs.
* subversion/include/private/svn_ra_private.h:
(svn_ra__replay_range_ev2): rename pool to SCRATCH_POOL
(svn_ra__replay_ev2): rename pool. fix EDITOR type. drop the baton
since the editor embeds that.
* subversion/libsvn_ra/ra_loader.c:
(svn_ra__replay_range_ev2): rename pool to SCRATCH_POOL
(svn_ra__replay_ev2): rename pool. fix EDITOR type. drop the baton

author: gstein
msg: Watch out for dangling pointers.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_serf/xml.c:
(svn_ra_serf__xml_cb_start): copy the elemname into the pool, as it
contains pointers into the RAW_NAME parameter value

author: tabish
msg: fix for: https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AMQCPP-403
